sentences.text: PSU Awards (50% of the LTI award)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PSU awards are calculated by multiplying the overall target LTI award value by the weighting assigned to the PSU element.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total PSU value is then multiplied by the weighting assigned to each PSU component (50% to Relative TSR, 25% to ROIC, 25% to Performance Cash).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of PSUs granted is based on the grant date fair market value of each PSU element using the Monte Carlo simulation method for the Relative TSR component and the grant date fair market value discounted to reflect the deferral of dividends for ROIC and Performance Cash components.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each NEOs PSU target number of shares is determined at the beginning of the three-year performance period and the actual number of shares earned at the end of the period is calculated based on our performance measured against the three financial metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of shares granted at the end of the cycle can range from 0% to 200% of the applicable target number of shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If TSR is negative at the end of the performance cycle, the rating for the Relative TSR measure is capped at 100%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the maximum value that can be earned under a PSU award is 400% of the stock price on the date of grant times the shares earned.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The award calculation is formulaic pursuant to the provisions defined in the award agreement and no adjustment can be made to the final number of shares granted, which is determined based on the performance outcomes relative to our pre- set metrics and goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants also accrue dividend equivalents on the shares earned, which are paid in cash following vesting of the underlying shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTIP Awards (20% of the LTI award)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: LTIP awards are cash-based and are calculated by multiplying the overall target LTI award value by the weighting assigned to the LTIP element.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each NEOs LTIP target is determined at the beginning of the three-year performance period and the actual award earned at the end of the period is calculated based on the same performance measures as those used for the PSUs: Relative TSR, ROIC and Performance Cash.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payouts can range from 0% to 200% of the applicable target.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The award calculation is formulaic pursuant to the provisions defined in the award agreement and no adjustment can be made to the final payout factor, which is determined based on the performance outcomes relative to our pre-set metrics and goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the 2016-2018 LTIP grants, any amount payable to a single participant in excess of $10 million will be forfeited.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RSU Awards (30% of LTI award)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RSU awards are calculated by multiplying the overall target LTI award value by the weighting assigned to the RSU element.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of RSUs granted is determined by the grant date fair market value discounted to reflect deferral of dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All RSUs awarded to NEOs in 2016 were subject to forfeiture to the extent the grant date value of the RSUs exceeded 0.2% of 2016 Performance Cash in the case of the CEO and 0.1% of 2016 Performance Cash in the case of each of the other NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These performance requirements were satisfied and no forfeitures occurred.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Selection of LTI Performance Measures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The LTI performance metrics approved by the Compensation Committee are measures that we believe most effectively support our long-term business and strategic goals and directly tie the long-term goals of our executive leadership team to the interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The measurements used for the financial component of our 2016 annual incentive plan (Sales, Segment Operating Profit and Cash from Operations) also serve as the foundation for achieving our long-term goals such that we must consistently achieve or exceed the Corporations annual goals in order to achieve our LTI goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The selected LTI performance metrics consist of Relative TSR (50% weight), ROIC (25% weight) and Performance Cash (25% weight).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We chose these three metrics because we believe they represent the best measures of value creation for the Corporation over a long-term period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also applied equal weighting to the market-based measure of value creation, TSR, to what we believe are the best internal measures of value creation, Performance Cash and ROIC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We selected Relative TSR to measure our performance against our industry peers in the S&P Aerospace Index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because every industry faces different challenges and opportunities, we believe that comparing our TSR against peers facing a similar business environment is preferred to those outside our industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the S&P Aerospace Index is, in our judgment, the best index against which to compare our Relative TSR, we recognize that it does not perfectly correlate to the environment in which Lockheed Martin operates since some firms in the index are almost entirely in the commercial aerospace business, some are entirely government contractors and some have a mixture of the two businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because the Relative TSR index is not perfectly aligned with the businesses in which Lockheed Martin operates and because any number of macro-economic factors that could affect market performance are beyond the control of the Corporation, we use ROIC and Performance Cash as internal measures that can be directly affected by managements decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ROIC measures how effectively we employ our capital over time, while our Performance Cash provides the means for investment or value creation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By including a cash measure in both our annual and long-term incentive plans, the plans also mitigate the risk of short-term cash strategies that do not create long-term value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As with our annual incentive performance goals, PSU and LTIP payouts deteriorate more rapidly as we move from target level to the minimum payout level than they increase as we move from target level to maximum payout level.

sentences.text: This asymmetry reflects the importance we place on meeting our financial commitments.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to base salary and annual and long-term incentive compensation, we offer a number of other compensatory arrangements to our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These indirect elements of executive compensation are not performance-based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose for offering these benefits is to provide an overall total rewards package that ensures security of executives, are for business-related purposes, and are competitive with the other companies with which we compete for talent.

sentences.text: Set forth below is a summary of the benefit, retirement and perquisite programs available to our NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Element      Description Health, Welfare and Retirement Benefits Our NEOs are eligible for savings, pension, medical and life insurance benefits under the plans available to salaried, non-union employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also make available supplemental pension and savings plans to employees (including the NEOs) to make up for benefits that otherwise would be unavailable due to Internal Revenue Service (IRS) limits on qualified plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These plans are restorative and do not provide an enhanced benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also offer a plan for the deferral of short-term and certain long-term cash incentive compensation, which allows our executives to defer all or a portion of their cash incentive compensation to termination of employment or beyond.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All NEOs are eligible for four weeks of vacation annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2014, we announced that accruals for all employees (including the NEOs) under our defined benefit plan will be frozen in two steps, with compensation accruals frozen on January 1, 2016, and service accruals frozen on January 1, 2020.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thereafter, retirement benefits will be earned through defined contribution plans beginning in 2016 with an additional company contribution of 2% of salary to a defined contribution which will increase to 6% in 2020.

sentences.text: For security reasons, our Board has directed our CEO to use the corporate aircraft for personal travel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As an additional element of our security program, we provide home security to certain executives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this approach is consistent with security generally provided to corporate executives in public companies in our industry.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given the nature of our business, additional security may be provided for travel in high-risk areas or to address particular situations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes it is important to provide this protection due to the nature of our defense business and because it believes that an employee should not be placed at personal risk due to his or her association with the Corporations business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a threat to an executive officer, the Classified Business and Security Committee reviews and approves the security recommended by our Chief Security Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that providing personal security in response to threats arising out of employment by the Corporation is business-related.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax Assistance We do not have agreements or severance arrangements that provide tax gross-ups (tax assistance) for excise taxes imposed as a result of a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we provided tax assistance for taxable business association expenses, security expenses and travel expenses for a family member accompanying a NEO for a business reason.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we paid an amount estimated to cover the income tax imposed on employees (including the NEOs) who traveled out of their home state for business and became subject to income tax in another state due to the business travel.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These items are reported in the All Other Compensation column of our Summary Compensation Table on page 50 and are further identified in the chart included in the footnote to that table on page 53.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The IRS requires that the executive pay income tax for these items even though the executive receives no cash in connection with the item.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax assistance for these perquisites took the form of additional payments and was made for the purposes of ensuring that these perquisites and the associated tax assistance were economically neutral to the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe the items for which we provide tax assistance are business-related and the associated tax liability imposed on the executive would not have been incurred unless business reasons required the items to be provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Innovation: Execute technology strategy, ensuring robust innovation, collaboration and strategic partnering
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Corporate Governance Considerations in Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Use of Independent Compensation Consultants
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent compensation consultant provides important information about market practices, the types and amounts of compensation offered to executives generally and the role of corporate governance considerations in making compensation decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committees charter authorizes it to retain outside advisors that it believes are appropriate to assist in evaluating executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the Compensation Committee continued to retain Meridian as an independent compensation consultant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with its retention of Meridian, the Compensation Committee considered the following factors in assessing Meridians independence:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meridian does not perform other services for the Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation paid to Meridian is less than 1% of Meridians revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meridian has business ethics and insider trading and stock ownership policies, which are designed to avoid conflicts of interest
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meridian employees supporting the engagement do not own Lockheed Martin securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meridian employees supporting the engagement have no business or personal relationships with members of the Compensation Committee or with any Lockheed Martin executive officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At its February 2017 meeting, the Compensation Committee renewed the engagement of Meridian.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At that time, Meridian confirmed the continuing validity of each of the factors described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The nature and scope of Meridians engagement was determined by the Compensation Committee and not limited in any way by management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A description of the services provided by Meridian can be found on page 36.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Policy Regarding Timing of Equity Grants
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a corporate policy statement concerning the grant of equity awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under that policy:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee is responsible for determining the grant date of all equity awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No equity award may be backdated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A future date may be used if, among other reasons, the Compensation Committees action occurs in proximity to the release of earnings or during a trading blackout period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposed equity awards are presented to the Compensation Committee in January of each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Off-cycle awards may be considered in the Compensation Committees discretion in special circumstances, which may include hiring, retention or acquisition transactions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our existing incentive performance award plan prohibits repricing of stock options or paying cash for underwater stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback and Other Protective Provisions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Guidelines include a clawback policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the policy (as incorporated in our award agreements), if the Board determines that an officers intentional misconduct, gross negligence or failure to report such acts by another person:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: was a contributing factor in requiring us to restate any of our financial statements; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: constituted fraud, bribery or another illegal act, or contributed to another persons fraud, bribery or other illegal act, which adversely impacted our financial position or reputation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Board shall take such action as it deems in the best interests of the Corporation and necessary to remedy the misconduct and prevent its recurrence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other actions, the Board may seek to recover or require reimbursement of any amount awarded to the officer after January 1, 2008, in the form of an annual incentive bonus or LTI award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The clawback policy is included in our annual incentive plan and in the award agreements for the RSUs, stock options, PSUs and LTIP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There were no events requiring Board consideration of a clawback action during 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event the Board recoups incentive compensation under the policy, management intends to disclose the aggregate amount of incentive compensation recovered, so long as the underlying event has already been publicly disclosed in our filings with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This disclosure would appear in the proxy statement following any such Board action and would provide the aggregate amount of recovery for each event if there is more than one applicable event.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The award agreements for the NEOs also contain post-employment restrictive covenants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The post-employment restrictions were incorporated into all executive level award agreements beginning in 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-Hedging and Pledging Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our policies prohibit hedging and pledging of Lockheed Martin stock by all directors, officers and employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Requirements for Key Employees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To better align their interests with the long-term interests of our stockholders, we expect our officers (including the NEOs) and other members of management to maintain an ownership interest in the Corporation based on the following guidelines:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Title Annual Base Salary Multiple Chairman, President and CEO 6 times Chief Financial Officer 4 times Executive Vice Presidents 3 times Senior Vice Presidents 2 times
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NEOs are required to achieve ownership levels within five years of assuming their role and must hold net shares from vested RSUs and PSUs and net shares from options exercised until the value of the shares equals the specified multiple of base salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The securities counted toward their respective target threshold include common stock, unvested RSUs, and stock units under our 401(k) plans and other deferral plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Unvested PSUs at target are not counted towards ownership levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of February 1, 2017, each of our NEOs exceeded their respective ownership requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Post-Employment, Change in Control, Divestiture and Severance Benefits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our NEOs do not have employment agreements but participate in the Lockheed Martin Corporation Executive Severance Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefits are payable under this plan in the event of a company-initiated termination of employment other than for cause.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the NEOs are covered under the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The benefit payable in a lump sum under the plan is two weeks of basic severance plus a supplemental payment of one times the NEOs base salary and the equivalent of one years target annual incentive bonus.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the CEO, the multiplier is 2.99 instead of 1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NEOs participating in the plan also receive a lump sum payment to cover the cost of medical benefits for one year in addition to outplacement and relocation services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To receive the supplemental severance benefit, the NEO must execute a release of claims and an agreement containing post-employment, non- compete and non-solicitation covenants comparable to those included in our NEOs LTI award agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to LTI, upon certain terminations of employment, including death, disability, retirement, layoff, divestiture or a change in control, the NEOs may be eligible for continued vesting on the normal schedule, immediate payment of benefits previously earned or accelerated vesting of LTI in full or on a pro rata basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The type of event and the nature of the benefit determine which of these approaches will apply.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of these provisions is to protect previously earned or granted benefits by making them available following the specified event.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We view the vesting (or continued vesting) to be an important retention feature for senior-level employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because benefits paid at termination consist of previously granted or earned benefits, we do not consider termination benefits as a separate item in compensation decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our LTI awards do not provide for tax assistance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a change in control, our plans provide for the acceleration of the payment of the nonqualified portion of earned pension benefits and nonqualified deferred compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All LTI awards require a double trigger for vesting to accelerate (both a change in control and a qualifying termination of employment), unless the successor does not assume or continue the awards or provide substitute awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For executives whose business unit is divested, 2015 RSUs accelerate and PSUs and LTIP are prorated to the day of the divestiture and paid at end of the cycle.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Starting with 2016 awards, RSUs, PSUs and LTIP are pro-rated to the day of the divestiture unless assumed by the successor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax Deductibility of Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporations tax deduction for compensation paid to each of the NEOs who are subject to the compensation deduction limits of Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code is capped at $1 million.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 162(m) provides an exemption from the $1 million cap for compensation qualifying as performance- based.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We intend for our annual incentive and LTI programs for NEOs to qualify as performance-based compensation exempt from the $1 million cap on deductibility.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporation and Compensation Committee reserve the right to provide compensation that does not qualify under Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reports the present value of the change in pension benefit for the NEO for the year reported (for example, from December 31, 2015 to December 31, 2016 nd is not the amount that will be paid to the NEO.

sentences.text: The disclosure is based on the Corporations final average compensation formula in its defined benefit plan which multiplies a percentage (1.25% of compensation below the social security wage base and 1.5% above that level) times years of service times the average of the employees highest three years of compensation in the last ten years ending with 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is the same formula used for all participants accruing a pension benefit in 2016; none of the NEOs (including Ms. Hewson) has been credited with any extra years of service or provided a benefit from a special or enhanced formula.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under a three- year final average compensation formula, increasing service, age and compensation will result in an increase in the earned benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to 2016, when an employee received a compensation increase, the three-year average compensation that went into the formula would likewise increase.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the past, the impact of that increase in the average would have been greater with a longer service employee because the pension formula multiplies the now-higher average compensation by years of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective December 31, 2015, the pay element of the pension calculation was frozen.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With pay no longer a factor, any increase in a NEOs pension benefit is based on service alone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Combined with the year-over-year value also being affected by the changes in interest rate and increased life expectancy assumptions, this results in a substantially lower increase in Change in Pension Value when compared to prior years.

sentences.text: The amounts reported for 2016, 2015 and 2014 used a discount rate of 4.125%, 4.375% and 4.00%, respectively, as the interest rate.

sentences.text: Longevity assumptions are used to estimate the life expectancy of plan participants during which they are expected to receive benefit payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recent actuarial studies indicate life expectancies are longer and have the resultant effect of increasing the total expected benefit payments to plan participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amounts reported beginning in 2014 reflect the use of new longevity assumptions.

sentences.text: Retirement Plans
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, the NEOs participated in the Lockheed Martin Corporation Salaried Employee Retirement Program (LMRP), which is a combination of several prior plans (collectively, the Prior Plan) for salaried employees with some protected benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The calculation of retirement benefits under the LMRP is determined by a formula that takes into account the participants years of credited service and average compensation for the highest three years of the last ten years of employment ending with 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Average compensation includes the NEOs base salary, annual incentive bonuses and lump sum payments in lieu of a salary increase.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NEOs must have either five years of service or be actively employed by the Corporation at age 65 to vest in the LMRP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Normal retirement age is 65; however, benefits are payable as early as age 55 at a reduced amount or without reduction at age 60.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefits are payable as a monthly annuity for the lifetime of the employee, as a joint and survivor annuity, as a life annuity with a five- or ten-year guarantee, or as a level income annuity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The calculation of retirement benefits under the Prior Plan is based on a number of formulas, some of which take into account the participants years of credited service and pay over the career of the NEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain other formulas in the Prior Plan are based upon the final average compensation and credited service of the employee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay under certain formulas in the Prior Plan currently includes salary, commissions, overtime, shift differential, lump sum pay in lieu of a salary increase, annual incentive bonuses awarded that year, and pre-tax employee contributions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A portion of the pension benefits for Mr. Tanner was earned under the Prior Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the NEOs were vested and eligible for early retirement as of December 31, 2016 under the LMRP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, the NEOs also participated in the Lockheed Martin Corporation Supplemental Retirement Plan (Supplemental Pension), which is a restorative plan and provides benefits in excess of the benefit payable under IRS rules through the LMRP, our tax-qualified plan (see the footnote to column (d) to the 2016 Pension Benefits table on page 58).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In July 2014, the Corporation announced that the LMRP will be frozen in two steps.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increases in compensation are no longer taken into account effective January 1, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Increases in service will no longer be taken into account effective January 1, 2020.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This change in plan structure also carries over to the Supplemental Pension benefit accruals available to the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Retirement benefits earned thereafter will be paid through defined contribution plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of the transition to paying retirement benefits from defined contribution plans, beginning in 2016 eligible salaried employees (including the NEOs) receive a 2% profit sharing contribution to the Lockheed Martin Corporation Salaried Savings Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NEOs continue to receive the 2% profit sharing contribution in the NCAP after reaching the Internal Revenue Code limitation for this contribution in the qualified plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This will increase to 6% beginning in 2020.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees (none of which are NEOs) hired after January 1, 2006 do not participate in the LMRP and already receive the 6% contribution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nonqualified Deferred Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants in our tax-qualified 401(k) plan may defer up to 25% of base salary on a pre-tax, Roth or after-tax basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we make a matching contribution equal to 50% of up to the first 8% of base salary contributed by the participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employee and Corporation matching contributions in excess of the Internal Revenue Code limitations may be contributed to the NQSSP on a pre-tax basis at the election of the NEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we also began making profit sharing contributions in excess of the Internal Revenue Code limitations to the NCAP equal to 2% of the NEOs base salary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employee contributions and Corporation matching and profit sharing contributions to the plans are nonforfeitable at all times.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NQSSP and NCAP contributions are credited with earnings or losses, as appropriate, based on the investment option or options in which the account has been invested, as elected by the participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the NQSSP and NCAP investment options is available under our tax-qualified 401(k) plan for salaried employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NQSSP and NCAP provide for payment following termination of employment in a lump sum or up to 25 annual installments at the participants election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All amounts accumulated and unpaid under the NQSSP and NCAP must be paid in a lump sum within 15 calendar days following a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Deferred Management Incentive Compensation Plan (DMICP) provides the opportunity to defer, until termination of employment or beyond, the receipt of all or a portion of annual incentive bonuses and LTIP awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NEOs may elect any of the investment funds available in the NQSSP (with the exception of the Company Stock Fund) or two investment alternatives available only under the DMICP for crediting earnings (losses).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the DMICP Stock Investment Option, earnings (losses) on deferred amounts will accrue at a rate that tracks the performance of our common stock, including reinvestment of dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the DMICP Interest Investment Option, earnings accrue at a rate equivalent to the then published rate for computing the present value of future benefits under Cost Accounting Standards 415, Deferred Compensation (CAS 415 rate).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Interest Investment Option was closed to new deferrals and transfers from other investment options effective July 1, 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Amounts credited to the Stock Investment Option may not be reallocated to other options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Stock Investment Option deferrals will be paid in shares of our common stock upon distribution.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The DMICP provides for payment in January or July following termination of employment in a lump sum or up to 25 annual installments at the NEOs election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All amounts accumulated under the DMICP must be paid in a lump sum within 15 days following a change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual Cash Retainer      $145,000 Annual Equity Retainer 1 $145,000 Audit Committee Chairman Retainer $25,000 Compensation Committee Chairman Retainer $20,000 Other Committee Chairman Retainers $15,000 Lead Director Retainer $25,000 Travel Accident Insurance $1,000,000 Deferred Compensation Plan  deferral plan for cash retainer Director Education  reimbursed for costs and expenses

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee annually reviews publicly available data for the companies that comprise the peer group we use for benchmarking executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No changes to director compensation were made in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The non-employee director annual retainer of $290,000 (not including Lead Director or committee chairmen retainers) is paid 50 percent in cash and 50 percent in equity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The cash portion of the non-employee director retainer is paid quarterly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lockheed Martin Corporation 2009 Directors Equity Plan (Directors Equity Plan) governs the equity portion of the non-employee director retainer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Directors Equity Plan is a separate equity plan for non-management directors only.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It was approved by stockholders in 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In June 2014, the Board resolved that each non-employee director would elect to receive the equity portion of the retainer in the form of stock units for each year beginning with 2015 and would not elect options to purchase shares unless the Board resolution is further amended or revoked.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Directors Equity Plan provides that a director eligible for retirement at the next Annual Meeting receives a prorated grant (one-third) for the four months of service prior to the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Except in certain circumstances, stock units vest 50 percent on June 30 and 50 percent on December 31 following the grant date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon a change in control or a directors retirement, death, or disability, the directors stock units and outstanding options become fully vested, and the director has the right to exercise the options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon a directors termination of service from our Board, we distribute the vested stock units, at the directors election, in whole shares of stock or in cash, in a lump sum or in annual installments over a period of up to 20 years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to distribution, a director has no voting, dividend or other rights with respect to the stock units held under the Directors Equity Plan, but is credited with additional stock units representing dividend equivalents (converted to stock units based on the closing price of our stock on the dividend payment dates).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outstanding options have a term of ten years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Directors Equity Plan provides that equity grants are made with respect to a calendar year on the second business day following the later of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the date of the first regular meeting of the Board in each calendar year, or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the date on which the Corporation releases its financial results for the previous calendar year; provided that, if such date is later than February 15, the award date is February 15 (or the next business day if February 15 is not a business day).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lockheed Martin Corporation Directors Deferred Compensation Plan (Directors Deferred Compensation Plan) provides non-employee directors the opportunity to defer up to 100 percent of the cash portion of their fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred amounts earn interest at a rate that tracks the performance of:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the investment options available under the employee deferred compensation plans; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) our company stock (with dividends reinvested), at the directors election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred fees are distributed in a lump sum or in up to 15 annual installments commencing at a time designated by the director following termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock Ownership Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To align their interests with the long-term interests of our stockholders, we expect our directors to maintain an ownership interest in the Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Director Stock Ownership Guidelines, non-employee directors have five years from the time they join the Board to achieve stock ownership levels (common stock or stock units) equivalent to five times the annual cash retainer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each non-employee director has exceeded the stock ownership guidelines, with the exception of Mr. Carlson and Ms. Gordon who have until July 2020 and June 2021, respectively, to meet the guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Hewson is subject to the Stock Ownership Requirements for Key Employees as described on page 49.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholder Proposal to Adopt the Holy Land Principles
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Holy Land Principles, Capitol Hill, P.O. Box 15128, Washington, D.C. 20003-0849, the beneficial owner of no less than 14 shares of common stock of the Corporation having a market value greater than $2,000, has notified the Corporation that it intends to present the following proposal at this years Annual Meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HOLY LAND PRICIPLES LOCKHEED MARTIN RESOLUTION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WHEREAS, LOCKHEED MARTIN has operations in Palestine/Israel;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WHEREAS, achieving a lasting peace in the Holy Land -- with security for Israel and justice for Palestinians -- encourages us to promote a means for establishing justice and equality;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WHEREAS, fair employment should be the hallmark of any American company at home or abroad and is a requisite for any just society;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WHEREAS, Holy Land Principles Inc., a non-profit organization, has proposed a set of equal opportunity employment principles to serve as guidelines for corporations in Israel/Palestine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Adhere to equal and fair employment practices in hiring, compensation, training, professional education, advancement and governance without discrimination based on national, racial, ethnic or religious identity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Identify underrepresented employee groups and initiate active recruitment efforts to increase the number of underrepresented emplo
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Develop training programs that will prepare substantial numbers of current minority employees for skilled jobs, including the expansion of existing programs and the creation of new programs to train, upgrade, and improve the skills of minority employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Maintain a work environment that is respectful of all national, racial, ethnic and religious groups.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. Ensure that layoff, recall and termination procedures do not favor a particular national, racial, ethnic or religious group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 6. Not make military service a precondition or qualification for employment for any position, other than those positions that specifically require such experience, for the fulfillment of an employees particular responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 7. Not accept subsidies, tax incentives or other benefits that lead to the direct advantage of one national, racial, ethnic or religious group over another.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 8. Appoint staff to monitor, oversee, set timetables, and publicly report on their progress in implementing the Holy Land Principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED: Shareholders request the Board of Directors to: Make all possible lawful efforts to implement and/or increase activity on each of the eight Holy Land Principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: UPPORTING STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proponent believes that LOCKHEED MARTIN benefits by hiring from the widest available talent pool.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An employees ability to do the job should be the primary consideration in hiring and promotion decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Implementation of the Holy Land Principles -- which are pro-Jewish, pro-Palestinian and pro-company -- will demonstrate concern for human rights and equality of opportunity in its international operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please vote your proxy FOR these concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 5: Stockholder Proposal
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors Statement in Opposition to Proposal 5
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lockheed Martin already has a worldwide nondiscrimination and equal employment opportunity policy that addresses the concerns of this Proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lockheed Martins policy and practice worldwide (including in Israel) is to provide equal employment opportunity to employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, religion, color, sex, pregnancy, national origin, age, veteran status, ancestry, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, family structure, genetic information, or mental or physical disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This global policy extends to recruitment, selection and other aspects of employment, such as promotion, transfer, layoff, termination, compensation, training and disciplinary action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have established a Code of Ethics and Business Conduct (Code of Conduct), which is available on our website at www.lockheedmartin.com/corporate-governance that applies to all of our employees, wherever they work.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Code of Conduct is translated in multiple languages such as Arabic and Hebrew, and includes our commitment to good citizenship, including the protection and advancement of human rights, equal employment opportunity and our zero tolerance policy for discrimination and harassment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our commitment to corporate responsibility is further highlighted in our annual Sustainability Report, which is available at www.lockheedmartin.com/sustainability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our policies are based on leading frameworks and input from stakeholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a global enterprise, we recognize various countries where we operate may have different standards in the workplace, however our standards apply to all employees and our Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lockheed Martin has a history of and a continued commitment to being a leader in sustainable business practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A major dimension of these efforts, diversity and inclusion, is embedded in our values of doing whats right, respecting others and performing with excellence, and as such, in our governance, staff functions, performance management process and Board oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We see diversity as the attributes people bring based on their backgrounds, experiences, capabilities and perspectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board of Directors and executive leadership team set the tone for diversity and inclusion throughout our organization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Executive Inclusion Council, comprised of leaders from across the Enterprise, oversees a comprehensive diversity and inclusion strategy, and reviews our goals and progress annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lockheed Martins executive leadership team approves and monitors a set of Enterprise-wide sustainability goals, known as the Sustainability Management Plan, and also provides strategic guidance on diversity and inclusion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Across Lockheed Martin, the Business Segments have established Diversity Councils that align their efforts with the strategic priorities established by the Sustainability Management Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They focus on driving the Corporations diversity and inclusion strategy within the businesses to promote an inclusive environment, business innovation and corporate success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given the strength of our existing policies and initiatives to ensure equal employment and non-discrimination of persons throughout our global operations, including our Israel operations, we believe that the adoption of this Proposal is unnecessary and would lead to increased administration and cost.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lockheed Martin is a company with global operations and regional or country-specific diversity commitments that are not required by law and would be inconsistent with our business and strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our policies need to be applied throughout the world in which we operate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We remain committed to the fair employment of employees in Israel and worldwide, however we believe the adoption of the Holy Land Principles is unnecessary and not in the best interests of the company, our stockholders or our employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board unanimously recommends that you vote AGAINST Proposal 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote if I participate in one of the Corporations 401(k) or defined contribution plans
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a participant in one of our employee 401(k) or defined contribution plans, you can direct the plan trustees how to vote shares allocated to your account(s) on a proxy voting direction or instruction card, electronically through the Internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most active employees who participate in these benefit plans will receive an email notification announcing Internet availability of the Proxy Materials and how to submit voting directions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide timely directions to the plan trustee, shares allocated to your account(s) will be voted by the plan trustee depending on the terms of your plan or other legal requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Plan participants may attend the Annual Meeting, but may not vote plan shares at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to vote, whether you plan to attend the Annual Meeting or not, you should direct the trustee of your plan(s) how you wish to vote your plan shares no later than 11:59 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, on April 24, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many shares must be present to hold the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order for us to lawfully conduct business at our Annual Meeting, a majority of the shares outstanding and entitled to vote as of the Record Date, must be present in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is referred to as a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares are counted as present at the Annual Meeting if you attend the Annual Meeting and vote in person or abstain from voting, or if you properly return a proxy by Internet, by telephone or by mail in advance of the Annual Meeting and do not revoke the proxy.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial Owners
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold shares through an account with a broker and you do not provide voting instructions, under NYSE rules, your broker may vote your shares on routine matters only.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young LLP (Proposal 2) is considered a routine matter, and your nominee can therefore vote your shares on that Proposal even if you do not provide voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 1, 3, 4, and 5 are not considered routine matters, and your nominee cannot vote your shares on those Proposals unless you provide voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes withheld by brokers in the absence of voting instructions from a beneficial owner are referred to as broker non-votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Multiple Forms of Ownership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporation cannot provide a single proxy or instruction card for stockholders who own shares in multiple forms as registered stockholders, plan participants or beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, if your shares are held in multiple types of accounts, you must submit your votes for each type of account in accordance with the instructions you receive for that account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the vote required for each proposal?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For Proposal 1, the votes that stockholders cast FOR a director-nominee must exceed the votes that stockholders cast AGAINST a director-nominee to approve the election of each director-nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each of Proposals 2, 3, and 5 the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast is required to approve the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to Proposal 4, a plurality of the votes cast will determine the stockholders preferred frequency for holding an advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In other words, whichever of the three options (one year, two years or three years) receives the greatest number of votes will be considered the preferred frequency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes cast exclude abstentions and broker non-votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals 2, 3, 4 and 5 are advisory and non-binding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board will review the voting results on these proposals and take the results into account when making future decisions regarding these matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the effect of an abstention?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A stockholder who abstains on some or all matters is considered present for purposes of determining if a quorum is present at the Annual Meeting, but an abstention is not counted as a vote cast.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An abstention has no effect on the vote on any proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the effect of a broker non-vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a broker casts a vote on Proposal 2 (Ratification of Auditors), the vote will be included in determining whether a quorum exists for holding the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The broker does not have authority to vote on the other proposals absent directions from the beneficial owner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, if the beneficial owner does not vote on Proposals 1, 3, 4 or 5 so that there is a broker non-vote on those items, the broker non-votes do not count as votes cast for that proposal and have no effect on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thus, a broker non-vote on these proposals will not impact our ability to obtain a quorum, will not affect the outcome with respect to the election of directors and will not otherwise affect the outcome of the vote on a proposal that requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who will count the votes?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Computershare will tabulate the votes and act as inspectors of election for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Where can I find the voting results of the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The preliminary voting results will be announced at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The final voting results will be tallied by the inspectors of election and disclosed by the Corporation in a Current Report on Form 8-K filed with the SEC within four business days following the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is householding and how does it affect me?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have adopted a procedure approved by the SEC called householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this procedure, we send only one Annual Report and Proxy Statement to eligible stockholders who share a single address, unless we have received instructions to the contrary from any stockholder at that address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This practice is designed to reduce our printing and postage costs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who participate in householding will continue to receive separate proxy cards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not use householding for any other stockholder mailings, such as dividend checks, Forms 1099 or account statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are eligible for householding, but received multiple copies of the Annual Report and Proxy Statement and prefer to receive only a single copy of each of these documents for your household, please contact Computershare, Shareholder Relations, P.O. Box 30170, College Station, TX 77842-3170, or call 1- 877-498-8861.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a registered stockholder residing at an address with other registered stockholders and wish to receive a separate Annual Report or Proxy Statement at this time or in the future, we will provide you with a separate copy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To obtain this copy, please contact Computershare as indicated above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you own shares through a broker, bank, or other nominee, you should contact the nominee concerning householding procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To vote all of your shares, you must submit a proxy or voting instruction card for each account (employee benefit plan shares, registered shares and beneficially-owned shares).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, you will receive a separate solicitation and proxy for each type of account in which shares are held.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appendix A: Definition of Non-GAAP (Generally Accepted Accounting Principles) Measures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement contains non-GAAP financial measures (as defined by SEC Regulation G).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While we believe that these non-GAAP financial measures may be useful in evaluating Lockheed Martin, this information should be considered supplemental and is not a substitute for financial information prepared in accordance with GAAP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our definitions for non-GAAP measures may differ from similarly titled measures used by other companies or analysts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Segment Operating Profit
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Segment Operating Profit represents the total earnings from our Business Segments before unallocated income and expense, interest expense, other non- operating income and expense, and income tax expense.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This measure is used by our senior management in evaluating the performance of our Business Segments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The caption Total Unallocated Items reconciles Segment Operating Profit to Consolidated Operating Profit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We use Segment Operating Profit as a performance goal in the annual incentive plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Return on Invested Capital
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ROIC is defined as net earnings plus after-tax interest expense divided by average invested capital (total equity plus debt) after adjusting total equity by adding back adjustments related to the Corporations post-retirement benefit plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We use ROIC as a performance measure for LTIP and PSUs.

sentences.text: Additional Information and Other Matters

sentences.text: Performance Cash
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Cash represents the Corporations cash from operations adjusted to exclude: (1) the difference between actual and planned pension funding under the Corporations Long-Range Plan and (2) unplanned tax payments or benefits on divestitures of business units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This definition is used in our annual incentive plan for performance limitation testing and in our award agreements for RSUs, LTIP and PSUs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance limitation is described on page 40.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our 2014-2016 cash from operations results were impacted by lower Cost Accounting Standards (CAS) cash recoveries due to the enactment of the Highway and Transportation Funding Act of 2014 (HATFA), which resulted in lower actual CAS cash collections than assumed in our LTIP target of approximately $1.2 billion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, our cash from operations adjustment for the difference between planned and actual pension funding was made on a gross, pre-tax effected, basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Had we been able to adjust cash from operations for the difference between planned and actual pension payments on an after tax basis, our adjusted cash from operations would have been $240 million higher.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If both the HATFA impact and the reduced tax deduction associated with the lower pension contributions was considered, we would have exceeded our cash from operations target by approximately $800M.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: State Street Bank and Trust Company, as Trustee of the plans listed above, is directed to vote the shares of Lockheed Martin Corporation (Corporation) common stock allocated to my account(s) in one or more of the plans listed above, at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of the Corporation to be held at 8:00 a.m., Eastern Daylight Time, on April 27, 2017, at Lockheed Martin Center for Leadership Excellence Auditorium, 6777 Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, Maryland 20817, with respect to the election of directors and the proposals and at any adjournments or postponements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: State Street will vote in accordance with the directions indicated on this card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: State Street will vote signed cards that are returned in accordance with recommendations of the Board of Directors where voting directions are not specified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no voting direction is received or if this proxy voting direction card is returned unsigned, the shares allocated to my account(s) will be voted by State Street in proportion to those shares allocated to accounts of participants for which timely directions were received, unless contrary to ERISA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SUBJECT:     Important Notice Regarding Availability of Lockheed Martin Proxy Materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lockheed Martin employees are the largest holders of our common stock (representing approximately 14 percent of our outstanding shares).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a Lockheed Martin savings plan participant, you are entitled to vote your shares held through the Lockheed Martin savings plans on the matters to be voted upon at the Corporations Annual Meeting of Stockholders on April 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tomorrow, you will receive an email from Computershare Trust Company, N.A. (cpucommunications.com), our independent registrar and transfer agent, with a subject line of Important Notice Regarding Availability of Lockheed Martin Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The email will include a link to the Corporations 2016 Annual Report and 2017 Proxy Statement (together, the Proxy Materials).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It will also contain information on how to vote your shares confidentially through the internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please look for your email from Computershare and vote promptly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Note that you may receive multiple proxy packages and voting instructions (electronically and/or by mail).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These materials may not be duplicates as you may hold shares of Lockheed Martin stock in multiple accounts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please be sure to vote all of your shares in each of your accounts in accordance with the directions on the proxy card(s) and/or voting instruction form(s) you receive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may request a hard copy of the Proxy Materials by calling 1-877-223-3863 (toll free) or 1-267-468-0767, if outside the U.S. Requests will be fulfilled until 3:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Daylight Time on April 17, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note: computer settings vary and unknown email addresses, such as those from Computershare, may sometimes be directed to your Junk Email folder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not see the email from Computershare in your inbox, check your Junk Email folder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: IMPORTANT NOTICE TO PARTICIPANTS WITH LOCKHEED MARTIN CORPORATION COMMON STOCK ALLOCATED TO THEIR PLAN ACCOUNT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Plan Participant:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The enclosed 2017 proxy materials have been prepared at the direction of the Board of Directors of Lockheed Martin Corporation (Lockheed Martin) in connection with its solicitation of proxies for the Annual Meeting of Stockholders to be held on April 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Evercore Trust Company, N.A. (EVERCORE) is the voting trustee with respect to the shares of Lockheed Martin Corporation common stock (Common Stock) held in the SANDIA CORPORATION SAVINGS AND INCOME PLAN (the Plan).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The enclosed Annual Meeting Proxy Card (the proxy card) is used for the purpose of giving voting instructions to EVERCORE with respect to shares held in the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This letter provides information concerning the voting of Common Stock held in the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recommendations of the Board of Directors with respect to matters to be voted upon at the Annual Meeting of Stockholders are printed on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you want to follow the Boards recommendations on all matters, you can do so by signing, dating and returning the proxy card in the enclosed postage-paid envelope without checking any of the boxes on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also provide voting instructions electronically by Internet or touch-tone telephone, as explained below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All matters to be voted upon at this meeting are extremely important and are described in the enclosed proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should carefully read these materials and follow the instructions below to complete and return the proxy card or provide voting instructions electronically by Internet or telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING DEADLINE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to ensure that your voting instructions to EVERCORE are tabulated in a timely fashion, your proxy card, Internet or telephone instructions must be received no later than 11:59 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eastern Daylight Time on April 24, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to provide voting instructions by returning the proxy card, you must complete, sign, date, and return your proxy card in the envelope provided in time for it to be received by the voting deadline.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please return your proxy card in the envelope provided which is addressed to Computershare Trust Company, N.A., the confidential vote tabulator for EVERCORE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EVERCORES RESPONSIBILITIES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the voting trustee with respect to the Lockheed Martin Corporation Common Stock held in the SANDIA Plan, EVERCOREs responsibilities include providing proxy materials to participants, ensuring the confidentiality of participants voting instructions, voting shares in accordance with participant instructions, and voting shares for which no instructions are received from participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HOW TO GIVE VOTING INSTRUCTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These instructions explain how you may give voting instructions to EVERCORE with respect to shares of Lockheed Martin Corporation Common Stock held in the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only EVERCORE can vote the shares of Common Stock held by the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, under the terms of the Plan, each participant may instruct EVERCORE on how to vote all shares allocated to his or her account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may instruct EVERCORE to vote for, against or to abstain on each of Proposals 1, 2, 3 and 5.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On Proposal 4, you may instruct EVERCORE to vote for one year, two years, three years or to abstain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign, date and return the proxy card but do not check any boxes on the card, EVERCORE will vote the shares in accordance with the Boards recommendations on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also provide voting instructions to EVERCORE by using the Internet or a touch-tone telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Simply access www.investorvote.com on the Internet or dial 1-800-652-8683 on a touch-tone telephone and follow the directions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You must have your proxy card available when you vote by Internet or telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you return the proxy card and also provide voting instructions by Internet and/or telephone, EVERCORE will follow your latest instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this purpose, the date on your proxy card will be the date for those instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If it is not possible to determine which voting instructions are the latest, EVERCORE will follow your latest dated electronic voting instructions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Failure to Provide Instructions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you fail to sign, date and return the proxy card or vote by Internet or telephone, EVERCORE will vote the shares allocated to your account in its sole discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CONFIDENTIALITY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your voting instructions to EVERCORE are confidential.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EVERCORE will not disclose how you voted or if you voted, unless required to do so by law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You should feel free to instruct EVERCORE to vote in the manner you think is best.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: QUESTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have any questions about your voting rights under the Plan, the proxy card or the confidentiality of your vote, please contact EVERCORE between the hours of 8:30 a.m. and 4:00 p.m.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pacific time at 1-888-296-2891.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EVERCORE TRUST COMPANY, N.A.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING TRUSTEE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dated March 17, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
